meanings.definition: A small sweet baked food typically containing flour, sugar, and eggs.
meanings.sent1: I love to bake cookies with my grandma on weekends.
meanings.sent2: After dinner, we enjoyed some delicious cookies for dessert.
meanings.sent3: The cookies were so good, they disappeared in seconds!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as warm and comforting as a fresh batch of cookies.
meanings.sent5: The smell of cookies baking in the oven filled the house with happiness.

meanings.definition: A packet of data sent by an Internet server to a browser, which is returned by the browser each time it subsequently accesses the same server.
meanings.sent1: The website uses cookies to remember my preferences.
meanings.sent2: Cookies help websites load faster by storing information.
meanings.sent3: I wonder if the internet cookies ever get tired of traveling back and forth.
meanings.sent4: In the digital world, cookies are like little messengers carrying important notes.
meanings.sent5: Without cookies, online shopping would be much more inconvenient.
